thread.title: Geek deals roundup: Save on PS4 bundles, iPads, and more
thread.title_full: Geek deals roundup: Save on PS4 bundles, iPads, and more

author: Editor - Technology News
title: Geek deals roundup: Save on PS4 bundles, iPads, and more
text:
iPad Air 16GB 4G LTE unlocked tablet for $299.99 
Looking to get a full-size iPad on the cheap? This new (open box) iPad Air is currently on sale for just 300 bucks on eBay. There’s a limited quantity, though, so don’t let this deal pass you by. 
Our commerce group sources the best deals and products for the Geek Deals posts. We operate independently of Editorial and Advertising and may earn a percentage of the sale, if you buy something via a link on the post. If you are interested in promoting your deals, please contact us at commerce@ziffdavis.com. 
For more great deals head over to TechBargains .
